summary:
A HIGH Realistic ENB, with much Performance and Mod-Recommendations, for the ultimate REAL Skyrim Experience! Including ENBoost.



 BASIC Installation should not take longer than 5 minutes
descriptionHtml:
[font=calvin][center][size=3pt][color=yellow]This ENB is designed to have [u]HIGH PERFORMANCE[/u] while it makes your Skyrim [u]REAL[/u]. If you are interested in Gameplay Reality Immersion, i`ve added Links here for you.[/size]



[u][size=6pt]Created to use in conjunction with:[/color][/size][/u]


[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img443/5638/logoncb.png[/img]

[u][size=6pt]and[/size][/u]


[img]http://fabioemerick.files.wordpress.com/2013/08/logo91.jpg[/img]



[color=yellow]Here is a short Preview how amazing YOUR Skyrim could look like if you follow my instructions, and use my ENB[/color]
[color=red](Please watch in FULL HD, to get an Impression).[/color]

[youtube]TJSqMya6C8s[/youtube]

[color=yellow]This video, and all my screenshots were taken by using this  [url=http://pastebin.com/VUGp4pC1]Load Order[/url] and all my recommended mods below!


[size=6pt][u]Index[/u][/size][/color]

[u][color=yellow][size=3pt]1.Requirements
2.Installation/Deinstallation Guide
3.Optional Section:

- \"Small\" Recommended Texture Compilation for allround better graphics

- Performance Tips and Z-Fighting Guide

- ALL recommended mods for ULtimate Realness

- Credits[/size][/color][/u]



[u][color=yellow][size=6pt]1.Requirements[/size][/color][/u]

[u][color=yellow][size=3pt]For Ewi65 .ini Files:[/size][/color][/u]

[img]http://s1.directupload.net/images/user/130725/nc54uzzl.jpg[/img]
[color=red](Highly Recommended for smoothed gameplay and best performance)[/color]

[size=3]Quad-Core Processor>2,5 ghz
8GB DDR3 RAM
2GB VRAM (Graphic card)[/size]

[color=red]DonÂ´t forget to change your Language and your Graphic card in the inis![/color]


[u][color=yellow][size=3pt]For my ENB[/size][/color][/u]

[size=3]None really, but with listed Textures below, it looks much better[/size]


[u][color=yellow][size=6pt]2. Installation Guide:[/size][/color][/u]

[size=3]1. Download the files from Boris Vorontsov,here: [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0229.htm]ENB[/url]
The Download - Button is at the top, left. Inside this folder you pick the d3d9.dll from wrapper version folder, and put it into your Skyrim directory, too. 

2. Change this Values in your SkyrimPrefs.ini 
(usually found in c:/users/current user/my games/skyrim):

bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
fGamma=1.2800
iBlurDeferredShadowMask=5 (when using \"Ultra\" shadows)
[color=red](This is already done in Ewi`s ini files)[/color]

3. Disable AA/SSAO/FXAA and Hi-Res Texture Packs in your Skyrim Launcher and your video driver settings.

[color=yellow]4. (Optional): Download Recommended Textures[/color]

5. Install Mindflux Particle Patch for ENB (do this after Installation of all your Textures, and let it overwrite)

6. Finally Download my ENB, and unzip it into your Skyrim directory.

7. Finish![/size]



[u][color=yellow][size=6pt]Uninstallation[/size][/color][/u]

[size=3pt]Delete the following files from your Skyrim folder:

-enbseries folder
-data/shaders folder
-d3d9.dll
-all files with enb
-common.fxh and technique.fxh[/size]


[u][color=yellow][size=6pt]3. Optional Section[/size][/color][/u]
[color=red](All my mod - Suggestions can be used together without any Problems[/color]


[u][color=yellow][size=3pt]\"Small\" Recommended texture Compilation for allround better Graphics[/size][/color][/u]
[/center][/font]
author: Mangekyoumadara1987
